title: Zac Chroma Skins
body: So I just play a LOL game not to long ago and I got Zac chroma pack. I selected his orange color and it didnt show. I was green. Please can you fix it asap. Thank you.{{champion:154}}

replies.body:
Hey BxScavage660,

Thanks for the report! 

We're aware of an issue where sometimes the chroma pack isn't loading properly. I often use the Koi Nami chroma pack myself, and have not had issues as long as I deselect the chroma and then re-select it. It's not the ideal workaround, but I've been able to use the chroma pack successfully.
